Framework Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

Contains the application framework to allow application execution within the library.

Prereqs File: This header file contains forwad class declarations of the Framework namespace to speed up compiling.


Classes

class  Application

Functions

void RunApplication (const char *appName)
 Creates and runs an application.

Function Documentation

void Framework::RunApplication ( const char *  appName  ) 

Creates and runs an application.

For internal use only.

This means that it creates the application and then calls its following methods setup: At the begining of the execution. end: At the end of the execution. draw: Called every frame. Here the application can draw and update its state.
